name: It's Okay (osmosian)
description:
This isn't a game, really. There are hardly any choices and it mostly just ends the same. 

This is very much a personal project that I wanted to expose to the world. It's a vent piece, but maybe something that somebody out there will relate to. 

This piece mentions suicide and mental health goodness. It's not violent or gruesome, but it is sad, I suppose. If you can't handle thinking about that right now, then please don't read it. Look after yourself. 

It's not my usual type of writing, and it's nothing special or life-altering, but it's here. Like we all are.
